newsFeedItemList.title: Illinois Ranks #2 State in the Nation for Corporate Investment
newsFeedItemList.description: CHICAGO — Site Selection Magazine – an international industry-leading business publication -- released its annual corporate expansion and relocation rankings, naming Illinois 2nd in the nation for corporate projects and Chicago the Top Metro for the 10th year in a row.

newsFeedItemList.title: State of Illinois Launches Coalition in Effort to Eliminate Viral Hepatitis in Illinois
newsFeedItemList.description: CHICAGO – The Illinois Department of Public Health (IDPH) launched a new effort today to eliminate viral hepatitis in Illinois.

newsFeedItemList.title: ILLINOIS LT. GOV. JULIANA STRATTON TESTIFIES AT U.S. SENATE HEARING ON THE EQUAL RIGHTS AMENDMENT
newsFeedItemList.description: WASHINGTON – The journey to equality must push forward.
